name: Bad Hoverdreams
description:
Bad Hoverdreams was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam.

Face your fears in this nightmare world  on a homemade hoverboard and defeat creepy creatures.

Bad Hoverdreams has two stages and a boss battle.

Main theme by Nicoteam Studios.
